alert.note: Alert for Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:09PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN OTSEGO COUNTY THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Springfield, or near Cooperstown, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Cherry Valley, Glimmerglass State Park, and East Springfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central New York.
